name: TV Shows Quiz | TV Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which is a name of a sister on "The Brady Bunch"?
questions.explanation:
Marcia.

	Marcia is the oldest Brady sister.

questions.text: What is the last name of Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen in 'Two of a Kind'?
In 'Friends' who is the most organized one?
questions.explanation:
Monica.

	This is my favorite show!

questions.text: What is the name of the Camdens' dog in '7th Heaven'?
What is the name of the oldest brother in 'Growing Pains'?
What is the family name in 'Smart Guy'?
In 'Even Stevens' who is most into sports in the Stevens family?
In 'Tenchi Universe' what is Tenchi's last name?
In 'Full House' who is Michelle Tanner?
questions.explanation:
The youngest sister.

	She is played by the Olsen twins.
